Articles.Content:
I felt inspired to produce a possible track for the title screen of Kerbal Space Program. This is keeping in theme with the music I produced for a KPS promo video I made.

Hope you guys like it. Because I had fun making it.

Link to the Demo Track

http://soundcloud.com/mwaddle/ksp-title-demo

Link to the promo Video.

Edited August 6, 2012 by OperationDx
update
The tracks are both exceptional, but I think I like the one you have in your promo video better. That video is great

Thank you, Thank you... On the title track I wanted to go a little softer. I made it this morning in less then an hour so this track is not fully developed. It's just a demo of a possible larger track. And I wanted to try and capture the same feeling as the Promo Video...
I fully agree with Bluejayek, the track in the promo is more fitting than the other one. But i like them both.

I liked the promo video and enjoyed the music. The separate track is good and enjoyable but for the menu screen needs a little more drama like the promo. Might be ideal for background during an IVA on a space station or MÃƒÂ¼n base. A 'we're here to stay, we've managed the impossible' sense of wonder sort of thing.

Look forward to seeing and hearing more

I liked the promo video and enjoyed the music. The separate track is good and enjoyable but for the menu screen needs a little more drama like the promo. Might be ideal for background during an IVA on a space station or MÃƒÂ¼n base. A 'we're here to stay, we've managed the impossible' sense of wonder sort of thing.

Look forward to seeing and hearing more

Right on. I'll keep this in mind if I decide to make more tracks for KSP.
Well Maybe I'll do a few more tracks just for fun. I'll update this thread as I make them.

The track and the video was awesome

(Shame about the mouse cursor though )
